reviews.text:
On Sunday mornings, from 10:30 to 01:30, there is a narrow gauge railway that runs around the top of the park.  For our grandson, who is a toddler, this was the highlight of his visit to Barcelona and there were many local families who also made the pilgrimage.

The park is not particularly easy to reach and there is not a lot there apart from the railway, but for kids this is a great experience and all for just 2 euros.
well, unless you really do not have anything to do, then go...but quite honestly you are better off going a bit further up and take the carretera de l#agua to see a stunning view of Barcelona
